name: Grumpy
line: (while driving) Three of a kind, let's do this.

name: Chuckles
line: That's it? Three guys?

name: Grumpy
line: Two guys on the roof. Every guy gets a share. Five shares is plenty.

name: Chuckles
line: Six shares. Don't forget the guy who planned the job.

name: Grumpy
line: (scoffing) He thinks he can sit it out and still take a slice. I know why they call him the Joker.

name: Happy
line: So, why do they call him the Joker?

name: Dopey
line: I heard he wears makeup.

name: Happy
line: Makeup?

name: Dopey
line: Yeah, to scare people. Y'know, war paint.

name: Grumpy
line: (taking the lead) All right, everybody, hands up, heads down! I said, hands up, heads down! (pulling one of the employees over the desk) Let's go, pal, I'm making a withdrawal here. (running to another employee) I said, hands up!

name: Dopey
line: Here comes the silent alarm. And there it goes.

name: Grumpy
line: Heads down! (dragging the other employee onto the floor) All right, tootsie, you're taking a dive with me. Down! I said, stay down there!

name: Dopey
line: Funny, it didn't dial 911. It was trying to reach a private number.

name: Happy
line: Is it a problem?

name: Dopey
line: No, I'm done here.

name: Grumpy
line: Sit down! Down! Down! I said, stay down there!

name: Grumpy
line: Obviously, we don't want you doing anything with your hands other than holding on for dear life.

name: Chuckles
line: (thwacking a hostage with his gun, waving it) On the ground! Stay on the ground! Nobody make a move! Nobody! Stay down!

name: Grumpy
line: He's out, right?

name: Grumpy
line: (frustrated) Where did you learn to count?!

name: Happy
line: They wired this thing up with like five thousand volts. What kind of bank does that?

name: Grumpy
line: A Mob bank. I guess the Joker's as crazy as they say. Where's the alarm guy?

name: Happy
line: Boss told me when the guy was done, I should take him out. One less share, right?

name: Grumpy
line: Funny. He told me something similar...

name: Happy
line: He what? No! No!

name: Grumpy
line: That's a lot of money. If this Joker guy was so smart, he'd have had us bring a bigger car.

name: Grumpy
line: I'm betting the Joker told you to kill me soon as we loaded the cash.

name: Bozo
line: (sighs, looks on his watch) No, no, no, no, I kill the bus driver.

name: Grumpy
line: Bus driver?

name: Grumpy
line: What bus driver?!

name: Peppy
line: School's out. Time to go. (looking at Grumpy) That guy's not getting up, is he?

name: Peppy
line: (grunting) That's a lot of money.

name: Peppy
line: What happened to the rest of the guys?

name: Bozo
line: I believe... whatever doesn't kill you simply makes you...

name: Joker
line: ...stranger.

name: Mayor
line: I already have.

name: Goon
line: (seeing the Bat Signal) No, man. I don't like it tonight.

name: Mayor
line: That's not true. Our men in the Major Crimes Unit are close to an arrest.

name: Ramirez
line: Hey, Wuertz, mayor says you're closing in on the Batman.

name: Wuertz
line: The investigation is ongoing.

name: Mayor
line: The process of cleaning up the streets is a long one. I pledged in my campaign, uh, to have...

name: Ramirez
line: Ever intending to see your wife again, lieutenant?

name: Gordon
line: I thought you had to go look after your mother, detective.

name: Ramirez
line: Checked her back into the hospital.

name: Gordon
line: I'm sorry.

name: Ramirez
line: (looking up) So he hasn't shown up?

name: Gordon
line: He often doesn't. I like reminding everybody he's out there.

name: Ramirez
line: Why wouldn't he come?

name: Gordon
line: Hopefully... because he's busy.

name: Chechen
line: That's why we bring dogs. (petting one of them) My little princes.

name: Junkie
line: Please! Please, they're crawling in my mouth! Please, I beg you, get them off!

name: Chechen
line: Look what your drugs do to my customers.

name: Scarecrow
line: Buyer beware. (climbing out of his truck) I told you my compound would take you places. I never said they'd be places you wanted to go.

name: Chechen
line: My business, repeat customers.

name: Scarecrow
line: You don't like what I have to offer, you can buy from someone else. Assuming Batman left anyone to buy from.

name: Chechen
line: My dogs are hungry!

name: Chechen
line: Pity there's only one of you!

name: Chechen
line: What?!

name: Scarecrow
line: That's not him...

name: Chechen
line: Loose the dogs!

name: Scarecrow
line: That's more like it.

name: Batman
line: Don't let me find you out here again.

name: Batman
line: I don't need help!

name: Crane
line: Not my diagnosis.

name: Batman
line: (lowered down into his car, hood sliding down) I'm not wearing hockey pads!

name: Officer
line: Everybody back now!

name: Ramirez
line: He can't resist showing us his face.

name: Gordon
line: What's he hiding under that makeup?

name: Ramirez
line: Uh, can we get a minute, people, please?

name: Batman
line: Him again. Who are the others?

name: Gordon
line: Another bunch of small timers.

name: Batman
line: Some of the marked bills I gave you.

name: Gordon
line: My detectives have been making drug buys with them for weeks. This bank was another drop for the Mob. That makes five. We found the bulk of their dirty cash.

name: Batman
line: Time to move in.

name: Gordon
line: We'd have to hit all banks simultaneously. SWAT teams, backup. What about this Joker guy?

name: Batman
line: One man or the entire Mob? He can wait.

name: Gordon
line: When the new DA hears about this, he'll want in.

name: Batman
line: Do you trust him?

name: Gordon
line: (looking down) Be hard to keep him out. I hear he's as stubborn as you are.

name: Alfred
line: (walking to his master) Be nice when Wayne Manor's rebuilt. You can swap not sleeping in a penthouse for not sleeping in a mansion.

name: Alfred
line: Whenever you stitch yourself up, you do make a bloody mess.

name: Alfred
line: You ought to be pretty knowledgeable by now, then.

name: Alfred
line: I'm sure Mr. Fox can oblige. (looking at the marks) Did you get mauled by a tiger?

name: Alfred
line: Why not hire them, take the weekend off?

name: Alfred
line: I know. But things have improved. Look at the new district attorney.

name: Alfred
line: Are you interested in his character or his social circle?

name: Alfred
line: I trust you don't have me followed on my day off.

name: Alfred
line: Know your limits, Master Wayne.

name: Alfred
line: Well, you do, sir.

name: Alfred
line: And what's gonna happen on the day that you find out?

name: Alfred
line: On that day, Master Wayne, even I won't want to. Probably.

name: Bailiff
line: All rise. The Honorable Judge Freel presiding.

name: Maroni
line: I thought the DA just played golf with the mayor.

name: Rossi
line: You win, counselor.

name: Rossi
line: It was me.

name: Rossi
line: Maroni? He's a fall guy! I'm the brains of the organization!

name: Freel
line: Order!

name: Freel
line: Granted.

name: Rossi
line: (standing up) Hostile? (pulls out a gun) I'll show you hostile!

name: Freel
line: Get him out of here.

name: Gordon
line: I hear you got a hell of a right cross. It's a shame Sal's going to walk.

name: Gordon
line: We liaise with various agencies...

name: Gordon
line: Official policy is to arrest the vigilante known as Batman on sight.

name: Gordon
line: If you got problems with malfunctioning equipment, I suggest you take them up with Maintenance, counselor.

name: Gordon
line: In this town, the fewer people know something, the safer the operation.

name: Gordon
line: If I didn't work with cops you'd investigated while at IA, I'd be working alone. I don't get political points for being an idealist. I do the best I can with what I have.

name: Gordon
line: Well, I can give you the names of the banks.

name: Gordon
line: Oh, you don't have to sell me, Dent. We all know you're Gotham's white knight.

name: Gordon
line: I wouldn't know about that.

name: Lau
line: In China, Lau Security Investments stands for dynamic new growth. A joint Chinese venture with Wayne Enterprises will be a powerhouse.

name: Fox
line: Well, Mr. Lau, I speak for the rest of the board...

name: Fox
line: ...and Mr. Wayne, in expressing our own excitement.

name: Reese
line: Sir, I know Mr. Wayne is curious about how his trust fund gets replenished, but... frankly, this is embarrassing.

name: Fox
line: You worry about the diligence, Mr. Reese. I'll worry about Bruce Wayne.

name: Reese
line: It's done. The numbers are solid.

name: Fox
line: Do them again. Wouldn't want the trust fund to run out, now, would we?

name: Fox
line: Another long night? This joint venture was your idea, and the consultants love it. But I'm not convinced. Lau's company has grown by eight percent annually like clockwork. His revenue stream must be off the books. Maybe even illegal.

name: Fox
line: You already knew.

name: Fox
line: Anything else you can trouble me for?

name: Fox
line: Yeah. Three buttons is a little 90's, Mr. Wayne.

name: Fox
line: You wanna be able to turn your head.

name: Fox
line: I'll see what I can do.

name: Natascha
line: (with a Russian accent) How could you want to raise children in a city like this?

name: Natascha
line: I'm talking about the kind of city that idolizes a masked vigilante.

name: Natascha
line: Gotham needs heroes like you, elected officials, not a man who thinks he's above the law.

name: Natascha
line: Someone like you, Mr. Dent?

name: Natascha
line: What if Harvey Dent is the Caped Crusader? Hm?

name: Lau
line: As you're all aware, one of our deposits was stolen. A relatively small amount. Sixty eight million.

name: Chechen
line: Who's stupid enough to steal from us?

name: Maroni
line: Two-bit wackjob, wears a cheap purple suit and makeup. He's not the problem. He's a nobody. The problem is... our money being tracked by the cops.

name: Lau
line: Thanks to Mr. Maroni's well-placed sources, we know that police have indeed identified our banks using marked bills...

name: Lau
line: ...and are planning to seize your funds today. And since the enthusiastic new DA has put all my competitors out of business...

name: Lau
line: ...I'm your only option.

name: Gambol
line: So, what are you proposin'?

name: Lau
line: Moving all deposits to one secure location, not a bank.

name: Gambol
line: Where, then?

name: Lau
line: No one can know but me.

name: Lau
line: If the police were to gain leverage over one of you, everyone's money would be at stake.

name: Chechen
line: What stopping them getting to you?

name: Lau
line: I go to Hong Kong, far from Dent's jurisdiction and the Chinese will not extradite one of their own.

name: Maroni
line: How soon can you move the money?

name: Lau
line: I already have.

name: Lau
line: For obvious reasons, I couldn't wait for your permission.

name: Lau
line: Rest assured, your money is safe.

name: Joker
line: And I thought my jokes were bad.

name: Gambol
line: (pointing at one of his goons) Give me one reason why I shouldn't have my boy here pull your head off.

name: Joker
line: How about a magic trick?

name: Joker
line: I'm gonna make this pencil disappear.

name: Joker
line: (yelling) Ta-da! (pulling up a chair) It's... (spreading his fingers) Ah, it's gone.

name: Joker
line: Oh, and by the way, the suit, it wasn't cheap. You ought to know, you bought it.

name: Chechen
line: Sit. (waves towards the clown) I want to hear proposition.

name: Joker
line: Let's wind the clocks back a year. These cops and lawyers wouldn't dare cross any of you. I mean, w-what happened? D-Did your balls drop off? Hm? You see, a guy like me...

name: Gambol
line: Freak.

name: Goon
line: Damn right.

name: Joker
line: (low volume) A guy like me... Look, listen. (louder, licks his lips) I know why you choose to have your little... (clears throat) group-therapy sessions in broad daylight. I know why you're afraid to go out at night. The Batman. See, Batman has shown Gotham your true colors, unfortunately. Dent? He's just the beginning.

name: Joker
line: Oh, and as for the television's… so-called plan, Batman has no jurisdiction. He'll find him and make him squeal.

name: Joker
line: I know the squealers when I see them. And...

name: Chechen
line: What do you propose?

name: Joker
line: It's simple. We, uh, kill the Batman.

name: Maroni
line: (sarcastic) If it's so simple, why haven't you done it already?

name: Joker
line: If you're good at something, never do it for free.

name: Chechen
line: (nodding his head) How much you want?

name: Joker
line: Uh... Half.

name: Gambol
line: (dumbfounded) You're crazy.

name: Joker
line: I'm not. No, I'm not. (clicks the T) If we don't deal with this now... soon little... uh, Gambol... here won't be able to get a nickel for his grandma.

name: Gambol
line: (slams against the table in frustration) Enough from the clown!

name: Joker
line: (opening his jacket, stepping back) Ah, ta-ta-ta-ta. Let's not blow...

name: Goon
line: Shit!

name: Joker
line: ...this out of proportion.

name: Gambol
line: (angry) You think you can steal from us and just walk away?

name: Joker
line: Yeah.

name: Gambol
line: I'm putting the word out. Five hundred grand for this clown dead. A million alive, so I can teach him some manners first.

name: Joker
line: All right. (waving his finger around) So, listen, why don't you give me a call when you wanna start taking things a little more seriously? Here's my card.

name: Gordon
line: All that was left in the vaults were marked bills. They knew we were coming. As soon as your office got involved...

name: Gordon
line: Don't try and cloud the fact that clearly Maroni's got people in your office, Dent.

name: Batman
line: If I get him to you, can you get him to talk?

name: Gordon
line: We're going after the Mob's life savings. Things will get ugly.

name: Gordon
line: He does that.

name: Fox
line: Our Chinese friends left town before I could tell them the deal was off.

name: Fox
line: What's wrong with a phone call?

name: Fox
line: Now, for high-altitude jumps, you're going to need oxygen and stabilizers. Well, I must say, compared to your usual requests, jumping out of an airplane is pretty straightforward.

name: Fox
line: I'd recommend a good travel agent.

name: Fox
line: (smiling) Now, that's more like it, Mr. Wayne. The CIA had a program back in the sixties for getting their people out of hot spots called Sky Hook. We could look into that.

name: Fox
line: Okay. Now...

name: Fox
line: Hardened Kevlar plates over titanium-dipped tri-weave fibers for flexibility. You'll be lighter, faster, more agile.

name: Fox
line: (playfully uneasy) Perhaps you should read the instructions first?

name: Fox
line: Now, there is a tradeoff. Separation of the plates makes you more vulnerable to knives and gunfire.

name: Fox
line: We talking Rottweilers or Chihuahuas? (nods) Should do fine against cats.

name: Alfred
line: I found one in Arizona. A very nice man. Said he could have it up and running in a week, and he takes cash. What about the flight crew?

name: Alfred
line: (smiling) Oh, yes.

name: Alfred
line: (pointing over his shoulder) I believe this is your plane, sir.

name: Alfred
line: If you can tell me the Russian for: "apply your own bloody suntan lotion."

name: Gambol
line: So, dead? That's five hundred.

name: Joker
line: How about alive? Hm?

name: Joker
line: (leaning forward, whispering) You wanna know how I got these scars? (normal volume) My father was... a drinker... and a fiend. And one night, he goes off crazier than usual. Mommy gets the kitchen knife to defend herself. He doesn't like that. Not... one... bit. So, me watching, he takes the knife to her, laughing while he does it. He turns to me and he says: "Why so serious?" He comes at me with the knife. (lifting the blade) "Why so serious?" He sticks the blade in my mouth. "Let's put a smile on that face." (almost in a sing-a-long tone) And...

name: Joker
line: Why so serious?

name: Joker
line: Now, our operation is small, but there is a lot of potential for... aggressive expansion. So which of you fine gentlemen would like to join our team? (holds up his hand) Oh. There's only one spot open right now, so we're gonna have...

name: Joker
line: ...tryouts.

name: Joker
line: Make it fast.

name: Fox
line: I understand.

name: Fox
line: Of course.

name: Lau
line: I must apologize for leaving Gotham in the middle of our negotiations. This misunderstanding with the Gotham police force... I couldn't let it threaten my company.

name: Fox
line: Of course.

name: Lau
line: A businessman of your stature will understand and, with you here now, we can continue.

name: Fox
line: Well, I do appreciate you bringing me out here in such style, Mr. Lau, but I re...

name: Lau
line: We do not allow cell phones in here.

name: Fox
line: I'm sorry. Forgot I had it.

name: Fox
line: No, I really came to tell you that our business deal has to be put on hold. You see, we can't afford to be seen to do business with... whatever it is you're accused of being. (as Lau stands up) I'm sure a businessman of your stature will understand.

name: Lau
line: I think, Mr. Fox, a simple phone call might have sufficed.

name: Fox
line: Mr. Wayne didn't want you to think he was deliberately wasting your time.

name: Lau
line: Just accidentally wasting it.

name: Fox
line: That's very good, Mr. Lau. "Accidentally." Very good.

name: Deskworker
line: (holding out Fox's phone) Hey, sir.

name: Fox
line: There's a better view from the peak tram.

name: Fox
line: Restricted. Lau is holed up in there good and tight.

name: Fox
line: I had R&D work it up.

name: Fox
line: Sends out a high-frequency pulse, records the response time for mapping an environment.

name: Fox
line: Submarine, Mr. Wayne. Like a submarine.

name: Fox
line: It's in place.

name: Fox
line: Mr. Wayne? Good luck.

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) Okay. Okay.

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese, to a bodyguard) Go look.

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) Where the hell are the cops?

name: Bodyguard
line: (In Chinese) Coming.

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) What the hell am I paying them for?

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) Let go! Let go! I'll give you anything if you let go!

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) Don't shoot!

name: Lau
line: (In Chinese) Don't shoot! Don't shoot!

name: Lau
line: Money is the only reason I'm still alive.

name: Lawyer
line: Are you threatening my client?

name: Lau
line: Wait! I won't give you the money, but I will give you my clients. All of them.

name: Lau
line: I'm good with calculation. I handled all their investments. One big pot.

name: Gordon
line: Charge them with what?

name: Lau
line: (interrupting, giving his demands) Immunity, protection and a chartered plane back to Hong Kong.

name: Lau
line: Like I said, I'm good with calculation.

name: Gordon
line: He can't go to County. I'll keep him here in the holding cells.

name: Gordon
line: Well, you trust them over at County?

name: Gordon
line: Lau stays.

name: Chechen
line: (while eating) Put word out. We hire the clown.

name: Chechen
line: He was right. We have to fix real problem. Batman.

name: Gordon
line: (looking over to the TV) Our boy looks good on the tube.

name: Maroni
line: You sure you wanna embarrass me in front of my friends?

name: Gordon
line: Oh, don't worry. They're coming too.

name: Gordon
line: Have a nice trip. See you next fall.

name: Surillo
line: Seven hundred twelve counts of extortion. Eight hundred and forty-nine counts of racketeering. Two hundred and forty-six counts of fraud. Eighty-seven counts of conspiracy murder. Five hundred and twenty-seven counts of obstruction of justice.

name: Surillo
line: How do the defendants plead?

name: Surillo
line: Order in the court.

name: Loeb
line: Mr. Mayor, you can't...

name: Mayor
line: No, get out. Both of you.

name: Mayor
line: (to Dent) Sit down.

name: Mayor
line: The public likes you. That's the only reason that this might fly. But that means it's on you. They're all gonna come after you now, and not just the Mob. Politicians, journalists, cops. Anyone whose wallet's about to get lighter. Are you up to it? You'd better be.

name: Mayor
line: Because they get anything on you and those criminals are back on the streets, followed swiftly by you and me.

name: Mayor
line: (stumbling back) Jesus!

name: Alfred
line: I think your fundraiser will be a great success, sir.

name: Alfred
line: I assumed it was your usual reason for socializing beyond myself and the scum of Gotham's underbelly: to try to impress Miss Dawes.

name: Joker
line: Tell them your name.

name: Joker
line: Are you the real Batman?

name: Joker
line: No?

name: Joker
line: No?!

name: Joker
line: Then why do you dress up like him?!

name: Joker
line: Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!

name: Joker
line: Yeah. You do, Brian. (grabbing Brian's head) You really do. Huh? Yeah! (stroking his head) Oh, shush, shush, shush, shush…. So you think Batman's made Gotham a better place? Hm? Look at me. (shouting) Look at me!

name: Joker
line: You see, this is how crazy Batman's made Gotham. You want order in Gotham? Batman must take off his mask and turn himself in. Oh, and every day he doesn't, people will die. (beat) Starting tonight. I'm a man of my word.

name: Alfred
line: (holding a tray with drinks) A little liquid courage, Mr. Dent?

name: Alfred
line: That's right, sir.

name: Alfred
line: Not yet, sir.

name: Alfred
line: (smiling) Oh, you have no idea.

name: Ramirez
line: Lieutenant, that joker card pinned to the body? Forensics found three sets of DNA.

name: Gordon
line: Any matches?

name: Ramirez
line: All three. The DNA belongs to Judge Surrillo, Harvey Dent and Commissioner Loeb.

name: Gordon
line: The Joker's telling us who he's targeting. Get a unit over to Surrillo's house. Tell Wuertz to find Dent. Protective custody. Where's the commissioner?

name: Ramirez
line: City hall.

name: Gordon
line: Seal the building. No one in or out till I get there.

name: Ramirez
line: Got it.

name: Loeb
line: Gordon. What are you up to?

name: Gordon
line: We're secure. I want a floor-by-floor search of the entire building. (to Loeb) We believe the Joker's made a threat against your life.

name: Cop
line: These are dangerous people.

name: Surillo
line: You're not giving me a lot of information.

name: Cop
line: Even we don't know where you're going. Take the envelope, get in, open it. It'll tell you where you're headed.

name: Loeb
line: Gordon, you're unlikely to discover this for yourself, so take my word, the police commissioner earns a lot of threats. I found the appropriate response to these situations a long time ago.

name: Loeb
line: You get to explain to my wife why I'm late for dinner.

name: Gordon
line: Sir, the joker card had traces of your DNA on it.

name: Loeb
line: How'd they get my DNA?

name: Gordon
line: Somebody with access to your office or house must have lifted a tissue or a glass...

name: Gordon
line: Wait! Wait!

name: Gordon
line: Oh, shit.

name: Gordon
line: Get a medic!

name: Joker
line: We made it.

name: Joker
line: Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. We are... tonight's entertainment. (grabbing a saute, chewing on it) I only have one question: where is Harvey Dent?

name: Joker
line: (slapping faces) You know where Harvey is? You know who he is?

name: Socky
line: Hands up, pretty boy.

name: Joker
line: Do you know where I can find Harvey? I need to talk to him. Just something little, huh? (shaking the guy's head) No.

name: Businessman
line: What's going on out there? Wayne!

name: Businessman
line: Hey, wait...

name: Joker
line: You know, I'll settle for his loved ones.

name: Joker
line: You know... (shakily slamming the glass down on a table) You remind me of my father.

name: Joker
line: I hated my father.

name: Joker
line: (parting his green hair) Well, hello, beautiful. (pointing with the knife) You must be Harvey's squeeze. Hm? And you are beautiful.

name: Joker
line: Oh, you look nervous. Is it the scars? You wanna know how I got 'em?

name: Joker
line: Come here. Hey. Look at me. So I had a wife.

name: Joker
line: Beautiful, like you. Who tells me... I worry too much. Who tells me I ought to smile more... Who gambles and gets in deep… with the sharks. Hey.

name: Joker
line: One day, they carve her face. We have no money for surgeries. She can't take it. I just wanna see her smile again. Hm? I just want her to know that I don't care about the scars. So... I stick a razor in my mouth and do this... to myself. And you know what? She can't stand the sight of me! She leaves. Now I see the funny side. Now I'm always smiling.

name: Joker
line: (waving his knife) Got a little fight in you. I like that.

name: Batman
line: Then you're gonna love me.

name: Batman
line: Drop the gun.

name: Joker
line: Oh, sure. You just take off your little mask and show us all who you really are. Hm?

name: Batman
line: Let her go.

name: Joker
line: Very poor choice of words.

name: Batman
line: Are you all right?

name: Batman
line: He's safe.

name: Stephens
line: Jim, it's over.

name: Gordon
line: As long as they don't get to Lau, we've cut off their funds.

name: Stephens
line: The prosecution's over. Nobody's standing up in front of a Judge while judges and police commissioners are getting blown away.

name: Gordon
line: What about Dent?

name: Stephens
line: He's got any sense, Dent's halfway to Mex...

name: Lau
line: You can't protect me. You can't even protect yourselves.

name: Alfred
line: You crossed the line first. You squeezed them, you hammered them to the point of desperation. And in their desperation, they turned to a man they didn't fully understand.

name: Alfred
line: With respect, Master Wayne, perhaps this is a man you don't fully understand either.

name: Alfred
line: A long time ago, I was in Burma and my friends and I were working for the local government. They were trying to buy the loyalty of tribal leaders by bribing them with precious stones, but their caravans were being raided in a forest north of Rangoon by a bandit. So we went looking for the stones. But in six months, we never met anyone who traded with him. One day, I saw a child playing with a ruby, the size of a tangerine. The bandit had been throwing them away.

name: Alfred
line: Because he thought it was good sport? Because some men aren't looking for anything logical, like money. They can't be bought, bullied, reasoned or negotiated with. Some men just wanna watch the world burn.

name: Operator
line: Your name, sir?

name: Joker
line: Eighth and Orchard. You'll find Harvey Dent there.

name: Batman
line: Check the names.

name: Gordon
line: "Richard Dent." "Patrick Harvey."

name: Ramirez
line: Harvey Dent.

name: Batman
line: I need ten minutes with the scene before your men contaminate it.

name: Ramirez
line: It's because of you these guys are dead...

name: Gordon
line: Detective!

name: Ramirez
line: Give us a minute, guys.

name: Gordon
line: That's brick underneath. Gonna take ballistics off a shattered bullet?

name: Batman
line: No. Fingerprints.

name: Gordon
line: Whatever you're gonna do, do it fast. Because we found his next target. He's put it in tomorrow's paper.

name: Alfred
line: I'm not sure you made it loud enough, sir.

name: Fox
line: What can I do for you, Mr. Reese?

name: Reese
line: You wanted me to do the diligence on the LSI Holdings deal again? Well, I found some irregularities.

name: Fox
line: Their CEO is in police custody.

name: Reese
line: No, not with their numbers, with yours. Applied Sciences. Whole division of Wayne Enterprises just disappeared overnight. I went down to the archives and I started pulling some old files.

name: Reese
line: Don't tell me you didn't recognize your baby pancaking cop cars on the evening news. Now you got the entire R&D Department burning through cash, claiming it's related to cell phones for the Army? What are you building for him now, a rocket ship? I want... ten million dollars a year for the rest of my life.

name: Fox
line: Let me get this straight. You think that your client, one of the wealthiest, most powerful men in the world, is secretly a vigilante, who spends his nights beating criminals to a pulp with his bare hands. And your plan is to blackmail this person?

name: Fox
line: (smiling) Good luck.

name: Reese
line: When... Keep that.

name: Fox
line: This is your original scan. Here it is reengineered.

name: Fox
line: I'll get you a copy. Mr. Wayne, did you reassign R&D?

name: Fox
line: Wasn't aware we had any government contracts.

name: Fox
line: Fair enough.

name: Alfred
line: I got one. Melvin White, 1502 Randolph Apartments. Aggravated assault, moved to Arkham twice.

name: Gordon
line: What do you got on the roof?

name: Mayor
line: Commissioner Loeb dedicated his life to law enforcement and to the protection of his community. I remember when I first took office and I asked if he wanted to stay on as commissioner. And he said he would, provided I kept my politics out of his office.

name: Mayor
line: Clearly he was not a man who minced words, nor should he have been. A number of policies that he enacted as commissioner were unpopular. Policies that flooded my office with angry calls and letters...

name: Mayor
line: And as we recognize the sacrifice of this man, we must remember that vigilance is the price of safety.

name: Stephens
line: Mr. Mayor. Get him out of here.

name: Barbara
line: No...

name: Stephens
line: I'm sorry, Barbara.

name: Barbara
line: Jimmy, go play with your sister. Go ahead, honey.

name: Stephens
line: If there's anything we can do, anything you need, we're here for you. Shh.

name: Barbara
line: Are you out there? Are you? You brought this craziness on us! You did! You brought this on us!

name: Stephens
line: Switch it off, he ain't coming. He doesn't wanna talk to us. (when it's turned off) God help whoever he does wanna talk to.

name: Broad
line: Can't we go someplace quieter? We can't hear each other talk.

name: Maroni
line: What makes you think I wanna hear you talk?

name: Broad
line: What?

name: Batman
line: I want the Joker.

name: Maroni
line: From one professional to another, you're trying to scare somebody, pick a better spot. From this height, the fall wouldn't kill me.

name: Batman
line: I'm counting on it.

name: Batman
line: Where is he?

name: Maroni
line: I don't know where he is. He found us.

name: Batman
line: He must have friends.

name: Maroni
line: Friends? Have you met this guy?

name: Batman
line: Someone knows where he is.

name: Maroni
line: Nobody's gonna tell you nothing. They're wise to your act. You got rules. The Joker, he's got no rules. Nobody's gonna cross him for you. If you want this guy, you got one way. But you already know what that is. Just take off that mask, let him come find you. Or you can let a couple more people get killed while you make up your mind.

name: Batman
line: You'd leave a man's life to chance?

name: Batman
line: His name's Schiff, Thomas. He's a paranoid schizophrenic, former patient at Arkham. The kind of mind the Joker attracts. What do you expect to learn from him?

name: Batman
line: You're the symbol of hope I could never be. Your stand against organized crime is the first legitimate ray of light in Gotham in decades. If anyone saw this, everything would be undone. The criminals you arrested would be released and Jim Gordon will have died for nothing. You're gonna hold a press conference tomorrow.

name: Batman
line: No one else will die because of me. Gotham's in your hands now.

name: Alfred
line: Logs as well?

name: Alfred
line: (walking towards Bruce) Endure, Master Wayne. Take it. They'll hate you for it, but that's the point of Batman. He can be the outcast. He can make the choice that no one else can make. The right choice.

name: Alfred
line: Today, I don't want to.

name: Alfred
line: But I did bloody tell you.

name: Alfred
line: I suppose they're gonna lock me up as well, as your accomplice.

name: Reporter
line: You'd rather protect an outlaw vigilante than the lives of citizens?

name: Crowd
line: Yeah!

name: Crowd
line: Give us the Batman! Come on!

name: Crowd
line: Where is he?

name: Crowd
line: What? Is he here?

name: Crowd
line: What? Come on.

name: Alfred
line: He went down to the press conference.

name: Alfred
line: Perhaps both Bruce and Mr. Dent believe that Batman stands for something more important than the whims of a terrorist, Miss Dawes. Even if everyone hates him for it. That's the sacrifice he's making. He's not being a hero. He's being something more.

name: Alfred
line: I do.

name: Alfred
line: How will I know?

name: Alfred
line: Bye, Rachel.

name: Cop
line: Hey, you wait like everybody else, pal.[Cop is shot by joker's goon]

name: Joker
line: (curiously)Hhmm

name: Joker
line: Harvey, Harvey, Harvey Dent. Oh, excuse me. I wanna drive.[joker steals the 18 wheeler to chase Havey inside the SWAT vehicle]

name: Joker
line: I like this job. I like it.

name: Joker
line: Okay, rack 'em up. Rack 'em up, rack 'em up, rack 'em up.

name: Joker
line: Now, there's a Batman.

name: Joker
line: Ooh, you wanna play. Come on. Come on.

name: Joker
line: Come on, come on.

name: Joker
line: Come on. Come on. I want you to do it, I want you to do it. Come on!

name: Joker
line: Come on.

name: Joker
line: Come on, come on. I want you to do it, I want you to do it. Come on, hit me. Hit me, hit me. Come on, hit me!

name: Joker
line: Hit me!

name: Joker
line: Come on, come on.

name: Joker
line: Could you please just give me a minute?

name: Gordon
line: We got you, you son of a bitch.

name: Gordon
line: We got him, Harvey.

name: Reporter
line: Mr. Dent! How does it feel to be the biggest hero in Gotham?

name: Reporter
line: But you and your office have been working with the Batman all along.

name: Reporter
line: Which was?

name: Ramirez
line: All right, people, that's enough. Let him be. Let him be.

name: Ramirez
line: I figured, counselor.

name: Reporter
line: Mr. Dent, sir, how about one for the front page, sir? Mr. Dent.

name: Gordon
line: Stand away! All of you! I don't want anything for his Mob lawyer to use, you understand?

name: Mayor
line: Back from the dead?

name: Gordon
line: I, uh, couldn't risk my family's safety.

name: Mayor
line: What do we got?

name: Gordon
line: Nothing. No matches on prints, DNA, dental. Clothing is custom, no labels. Nothing in his pockets but knives and lint. No name. No other alias.

name: Mayor
line: Go home, Gordon. The clown'll keep till morning. Go get some rest. You're gonna need it. Tomorrow you take the big job. You don't have any say in the matter. Commissioner Gordon.

name: Gordon
line: I'm sorry, I couldn't risk your safety.

name: Criminal
line: I don't feel good.

name: Criminal
line: Please!

name: Criminal
line: My insides hurt.

name: Jimmy
line: Did Batman save you, Daddy?

name: Gordon
line: Actually, this time... I saved him.

name: Gordon
line: Has he said anything yet?

name: Joker
line: Evening, Commissioner.

name: Gordon
line: Harvey Dent never made it home.

name: Joker
line: Of course not.

name: Gordon
line: What have you done with him?

name: Joker
line: Me? I was right here.

name: Joker
line: (pointing) Who did you leave him with? Hm? Your people? Assuming, of course, that they are still your people… and not Maroni's. Does it depress you, Commissioner, to know... just how alone you really are? Does it make you feel responsible for Harvey Dent's current predicament?

name: Gordon
line: Where is he?

name: Joker
line: What's the time?

name: Gordon
line: What difference does that make?

name: Joker
line: Well, depending on the time, he may be in one spot or several.

name: Gordon
line: If we're gonna play games...

name: Joker
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Gordon
line: ...I'm gonna need a cup of coffee.

name: Joker
line: Ah... The "good cop, bad cop" routine?

name: Gordon
line: Not exactly.

name: Joker
line: Never start with the head. The victim gets all fuzzy. He can't feel the next...

name: Joker
line: See?

name: Batman
line: You wanted me. Here I am.

name: Joker
line: I wanted to see what you'd do.

name: Joker
line: And you didn't disappoint. You let five people die. Then... you let Dent take your place. Even to a guy like me, that's cold.

name: Batman
line: Where's Dent?

name: Joker
line: Those Mob fools want you gone so they can get back... (twirling his fingers) to the way things were. But I know the truth. There's no going back. You've changed things. Forever.

name: Batman
line: Then why do you wanna kill me?

name: Joker
line: (laughing) I-I don't wanna kill you. What would I do without you? Go back to ripping off Mob dealers? No, no. No. No, you... You complete me.

name: Batman
line: You're garbage who kills for money.

name: Joker
line: Don't talk like one of them. You're not. Even if you'd like to be. To them, you're just a freak... like me. They need you right now. But when they don't, they'll cast you out. Like a leper. You see, their morals, their code... it's a bad joke. Dropped at the first sign of trouble. They're only as good as the world allows them to be. I'll show you. When the chips are down... these, uh, these civilized people, they'll eat each other.

name: Joker
line: See, I'm not a monster. (leaning forward) I'm just ahead of the curve.

name: Batman
line: Where's Dent?!

name: Joker
line: You have all these rules, and you think they'll save you?

name: Gordon
line: He's in control.

name: Batman
line: I have one rule.

name: Joker
line: Oh. Then that's the rule you'll have to break to know the truth.

name: Batman
line: Which is?!

name: Joker
line: The only sensible way to live is without rules. And tonight you're gonna break your one rule.

name: Batman
line: I'm considering it.

name: Joker
line: There's only minutes left, so you'll have to play my game if you wanna save one of them.

name: Batman
line: (confused, breathing heavily) "Them"?

name: Joker
line: You know, for a while there… (pulling himself up) I thought you really were Dent. The way you threw yourself after her.

name: Joker
line: Look at you go!

name: Joker
line: (groans) Does Harvey know about you and his little bunny?

name: Batman
line: Where are they?!

name: Joker
line: Killing is making a choice.

name: Batman
line: Where are they?!

name: Joker
line: Choose between one life or the other. Your friend the district attorney, or his blushing bride-to-be.

name: Joker
line: You have nothing, nothing to threaten me with! Nothing to do, with all your strength!

name: Joker
line: Don't worry, I'm gonna tell you where they are. Both of them. And that's the point. You'll have to choose. (thinking) He's at 250 52nd Street... and she's, uh, on Avenue X at Cicero.

name: Gordon
line: Which one you going after?

name: Batman
line: Rachel!

name: Gordon
line: We're getting Dent! 250 52nd Street!

name: Joker
line: I want... my phone call. I want it. I want it! I want my phone call!

name: Stephens
line: (guarding the door) That's nice.

name: Joker
line: How many of your friends have I killed?

name: Stephens
line: I'm a twenty-year man and I know the difference between punks who need a lesson in manners and the freaks like you who just enjoy it. And you killed six of my friends.

name: Joker
line: [mouths] Six?

name: Kilson
line: Please. My insides hurt!

name: Kilson
line: The boss said he'd make the voices go away. He said he'd go inside and replace them with bright lights... (laughs weezily) Like Christmas.

name: Gordon
line: (over the police radio) All available units, converge at 250 52nd Street.

name: Joker
line: Do you wanna know why I use a knife? Guns are too quick. (twirling his fingers) You can't savor all the... little... emotions. You see... in their last moments, people show you who they really are. So in a way, I knew your friends better than you ever did.

name: Joker
line: Would you like to know which of them were cowards?

name: Doctor
line: He's got some kind of... contusion.

name: Stephens
line: I know you're gonna enjoy this.

name: Stephens
line: I'm gonna have to try and enjoy it even more.

name: Stephens
line: It's my own damn fault, just shoot him!

name: Joker
line: What? Sorry?

name: Joker
line: I just want my phone call.

name: Joker
line: Shh, shh, shh...

name: Joker
line: Right.

name: Gordon
line: Mount the curb!

name: Cop
line: No, commissioner!

name: Joker
line: Hello there.

name: Cop
line: Back at the MCU, the Joker's gone.

name: Gordon
line: With Lau? The Joker planned to be caught. He wanted me to lock him up in the MCU.

name: Batman
line: I'm sorry, Harvey.

name: Alfred
line: Prepared a little breakfast.

name: Alfred
line: Very well, then.

name: Alfred
line: Yes, Master Wayne?

name: Alfred
line: You have inspired good. But you spat in the faces of Gotham's criminals. Didn't you think there might be casualties? Things always get worse before they get better.

name: Alfred
line: Rachel believed in what you stood for. What we stand for. Gotham needs you.

name: Alfred
line: Which is why, for now, they're gonna have to make do with you.

name: Alfred
line: It can wait.

name: Alfred
line: Yes.

name: Alfred
line: We burned the forest down.

name: Gordon
line: I'm sorry about Rachel. (beat) The doctor says you're in agonizing pain, but that you won't accept medication. That you're refusing to accept... skin grafts.

name: Gordon
line: Harvey, I...

name: Gordon
line: Two-Face. Harvey Two-Face...

name: Gordon
line: I know you tried to warn me. I'm sorry. Wuertz picked you up. Was he working for them? Do you know who picked up Rachel?

name: Gordon
line: Harvey, I need to know which of my men I can trust.

name: Gordon
line: I'm sorry, Harvey.

name: Maroni
line: This craziness, it's too much.

name: Gordon
line: Should've thought about that before you let the clown out of the box.

name: Maroni
line: You want him?

name: Maroni
line: I can tell you where he'll be this afternoon.

name: Chechen
line: (smiling) Not so crazy as you look.

name: Joker
line: I told you, I'm a man of my word.

name: Joker
line: (looking around) Where is the Italian?

name: Gordon
line: All tactical units will converge on the location in twenty minutes. I want auxiliary units to cover all possible getaway routes.

name: Lau
line: Please.

name: Chechen
line: Yo, Joker-man... What you do with all your money?

name: Joker
line: You see, I'm a guy of simple taste. (waving his arms) I enjoy, uh, dynamite, gunpowder...

name: Joker
line: (louder) ...and gasoline.

name: Chechen
line: What the...

name: Joker
line: (raising his gun) A-pa-pa-pa... (walking up to the Chechen) And you know the thing that they have in common? They're cheap.

name: Caller
line: How much are they paying you to say who Batman is?

name: Gordon
line: This is our chance. I want Lau alive. The Joker, either way.

name: Stephens
line: Hey, Jim. Get a load of this.

name: Caller
line: Harvey Dent didn't wanna give in to this maniac. You think you know better?

name: Reese
line: I think that if we could talk to Dent today, he may feel differently.

name: Chechen
line: You said you were a man of your word.

name: Joker
line: Oh, I am.

name: Joker
line: I'm only burning my half.

name: Joker
line: All you care about is money. This town deserves a better class of criminal... and I'm gonna give it to 'em. Tell your men they work for me now. This is my city.

name: Chechen
line: (angry) They won't work... for a freak.

name: Joker
line: "Freak?" (drawing his knife) Why don't we cut you up into little pieces and feed you to your pooches?

name: Joker
line: Hm? And then we'll see how loyal a hungry dog really is!

name: Joker
line: It's not about money. It's about sending a message. (dialing a number) "Everything burns".

name: Joker
line: I had a vision... of a world without Batman. The Mob ground out a little profit and the police tried to shut them down one block at a time. And it was so... boring. I've had a change of heart. I don't want Mr. Reese spoiling everything, but why should I have all the fun?

name: Joker
line: Let's give someone else a chance. If Coleman Reese isn't dead in sixty minutes, then I blow up a hospital.

name: Gordon
line: Call in every officer. Tell them to head to their nearest hospital and start evac and search. Call the transit authority, school board, prisons. Get every bus down to a hospital. The priority is Gotham General. Wheel everybody out of that place right now. (pointing) You, you and you, you come with me.

name: Gordon
line: To get Reese.

name: Alfred
line: Looking for?

name: Alfred
line: Will you be wanting the Batpod?

name: Alfred
line: The Lamborghini, then.

name: Alfred
line: (to himself) Much more subtle.

name: Gordon
line: Get the cars around the back!

name: Alfred
line: No immediate family member admitted to a Gotham hospital.

name: Reese
line: They're trying to kill me.

name: Gordon
line: Well, maybe Batman can save you.

name: Alfred
line: Nothing on them.

name: Reese
line: Okay, so, what now? What do we do now? Where are we going?

name: Gordon
line: It's Berg, isn't it?

name: Berg
line: Commissioner.

name: Gordon
line: You okay, son?

name: Joker
line: (to himself) Cadang-cadang-cadang-cadang...

name: Joker
line: (breathes out, smiling) Hi.

name: Joker
line: You know... I don't want there to be any hard feelings between us, Harvey. When you and… um, uh...

name: Joker
line: ...Rachel were being abducted, I was sitting in Gordon's cage. I-I didn't rig those charges.

name: Joker
line: Do I really look like a guy with a plan? You know what I am? I'm a dog chasing cars. (shaking his hands) I wouldn't know what to do with one if I... caught it. You know? I just do things. The Mob has plans. The cops have plans. Gordon's got plans. You know... They're schemers. Schemers trying to control their little worlds. I'm not a schemer. I try to show the schemers how pathetic their attempts to control things really are. So... when I say... Ah. Come here.

name: Joker
line: When I say that you and your girlfriend was nothing personal, you'll know that I'm telling the truth.

name: Gordon
line: I'm gonna need your weapon.

name: Berg
line: What?

name: Berg
line: Why? Because my wife's in the hospital?

name: Gordon
line: Yeah, that'd be why.

name: Joker
line: It's the schemers that put you where you are. You were a schemer, you had plans… and, uh... look where that got ya.

name: Joker
line: I just did what I do best. (waving, sing-a-long tone) I took your little plan and I turned it on itself. (looking up) Look what I did to this city with a few drums of gas and a couple of bullets. Hm? You know… You know what I noticed? Nobody panics when things go "according to plan." Even if the plan is horrifying. If tomorrow I tell the press that, like, a gangbanger will get shot, or a truckload of soldiers will be blowing up, nobody panics. Because it's all part of the plan. But when I say that one little old mayor will die... well, then, everyone loses their minds.

name: Joker
line: Introduce a little anarchy. (arming the gun) Upset the established order and everything becomes chaos.

name: Joker
line: I'm an agent of chaos. Oh, and you know the thing about chaos? (waving his finger) It's fair.

name: Joker
line: Mm-hmm…

name: Joker
line: Hmm… Now we're talking.

name: Berg
line: Mr. Reese...

name: Gordon
line: That's Mr. Wayne, isn't it? That was a very brave thing you did.

name: Gordon
line: You weren't protecting the van?

name: Gordon
line: You don't watch a whole lot of news, do you, Mr. Wayne?

name: Joker
line: (whipsering explosion) Boom!

name: Gordon
line: Southeast. It's Gotham General. Did you clear the building?

name: Gordon
line: You must know how many were inside. You have patient lists, roll call.

name: Gordon
line: What's your guess about where Harvey Dent is? Keep looking. And keep it to yourself. Anybody asks, we got him out. Get me the mayor's office on the line. We're gonna need the National Guard.

name: Joker
line: Bench. Game.

name: Joker
line: Mine.

name: Joker
line: Rules.

name: Joker
line: Get out now.

name: Bartender
line: Sweet Jesus.

name: Bartender
line: Shouldn't you be out there? You know, doing something?

name: Wuertz
line: It's my day off.

name: Bartender
line: I gotta take a leak. Keep an eye out for me, will you?

name: Wuertz
line: Now what? Need someone to shake it for you?

name: Wuertz
line: Dent. Jesus, I thought you was dead...

name: Wuertz
line: It must've been Maroni's men.

name: Wuertz
line: I don't know, he never told me! Listen, Dent, I-I swear to God, I didn't know what they were gonna do to you!

name: Batman
line: Beautiful, isn't it?

name: Fox
line: Beautiful… unethical... dangerous. You've turned every cell phone in Gotham into a microphone.

name: Batman
line: And a high-frequency generator-receiver.

name: Fox
line: You took my sonar concept and applied it to every phone in the city. With half the city feeding you sonar, you can image all of Gotham. This is wrong.

name: Batman
line: I've gotta find this man, Lucius.

name: Fox
line: At what cost?

name: Batman
line: The database is null-key encrypted. It can only be accessed by one person.

name: Fox
line: This is too much power for one person.

name: Batman
line: That's why I gave it to you. Only you can use it.

name: Fox
line: Spying on thirty million people isn't part of my job description.

name: Batman
line: This is an audio sample. If he talks within range of any phone in the city, you can triangulate his position.

name: Fox
line: I'll help you this one time. But consider this my resignation. As long as this machine is at Wayne Enterprises, I won't be.

name: Batman
line: When you're finished... type in your name.

name: Gordon
line: My officers are going over every inch of the tunnels and bridges, but with the Joker's threat, they're not an option.

name: Mayor
line: And land routes east?

name: Gordon
line: Backed up for hours. Which leaves the ferries with thirty thousand ready to board. I wanna use the ferries so I can get those prisoners off the island.

name: Mayor
line: The men you put away? Those aren't people I'm worried about.

name: Gordon
line: You should be. Whatever the Joker's planning, it's a good bet Harvey's prisoners are involved. I wanna get them out of here.

name: Mayor
line: So where is Harvey?

name: Gordon
line: We haven't found him.

name: Mayor
line: Oh, Jesus.

name: Mayor
line: How long can you keep this quiet?

name: Maroni
line: (to his driver) Don't stop for lights, cops, nothing.

name: Maroni
line: Yes.

name: Maroni
line: Look, take it up with the Joker. He killed your woman. He made you... like this.

name: Maroni
line: Look, if I tell you... will you let me go?

name: Maroni
line: (smiling) It was Ramirez.

name: Maroni
line: But you said-!

name: Maroni
line: Who?

name: Citizen
line: Hey, that ain't right. We should be on that boat.

name: Cop
line: You wanna ride across with them? Be my guest.

name: Batman
line: Fox. There's something going on on the ferries.

name: Joker
line: Tonight, you're all gonna be a part of a social experiment. Through the magic of diesel fuel and ammonium nitrate, I'm ready right now to blow you all sky-high.

name: Joker
line: If anyone attempts to get off their boat, you all die.

name: Fox
line: I'm zeroing in.

name: Joker
line: Each of you has a remote to blow up the other boat.

name: Fox
line: His voice is on the ferry, but it's not the source.

name: Fox
line: West.

name: Batman
line: I have the Joker's location. Prewitt Building. Assemble on the building opposite.

name: Joker
line: At midnight, I blow you all up. If, however, one of you presses the button, I'll let that boat live. So who's it gonna be? Harvey Dent's most-wanted scumbag collection or the sweet and innocent civilians? You choose. Oh, and you might wanna decide quickly, because the people on the other boat may not be quite so noble.

name: Businessman
line: Well, now, who are you to decide? We ought to talk this over, at least.

name: Mother
line: We don't all have to die. Those men had their chance.

name: Crowd
line: (each sentence a different civilan)Why aren't we talking about it? They're talking over the same thing on the other boat. Let's put it to a vote. Yes!

name: Barbara
line: Hello?

name: Ramirez
line: Barbara, it's Anna Ramirez. Jim needs you to pack up and put the kids in the car right away.

name: Barbara
line: But the units outside...

name: Ramirez
line: Those cops can't be trusted. Jim needs you away from them as soon as possible. (shaky voice) I'll call them off for ten minutes, and you'll have to move fast.

name: Barbara
line: But where am I supposed to take them?

name: Ramirez
line: 250 52nd Sweet. Leave as soon as the patrol car pulls out.

name: Barbara
line: Okay.

name: Ramirez
line: I didn't know...

name: Ramirez
line: (stammering, terrified) They got me early on... my mother's hospital bills...

name: Ramirez
line: I'm sorry.

name: SWAT
line: We found the missing hospital bus.

name: Gordon
line: Then we have a hostage situation.

name: Gordon
line: It's a shooting gallery.

name: Gordon
line: Why would he choose a spot with such big windows?

name: SWAT
line: We have clear shots on five clowns. Snipers take them out, smash the windows, a team rappels in. Team moves in by the stairwells. Two, three casualties max. Let's do it.

name: Batman
line: It's not that simple. With the Joker, it never is.

name: Gordon
line: (frustrated) What's simple is, every second, those people on the ferries get closer to blowing...

name: Batman
line: That won't happen.

name: Gordon
line: Then he'll blow both of them up!

name: Police
line: (in the background)Thank you. Anybody else? Coming through. Anybody else? Thank you.

name: Crowd
line: Come on. What are you waiting for? Push the button! We're running out of time!

name: Batman
line: I need five minutes alone.

name: Gordon
line: No! There's no time! We have clear shots! Dent is in there with them! We have to save Dent!

name: Gordon
line: I... have to save Dent. (to his men) Get ready. Two minutes, then we breach.

name: Batman
line: Fox, I need picture.

name: Gordon
line: Hello?

name: Barbara
line: Jim, we're in trouble.

name: Fox
line: Okay, you got POV on alpha, omni on beta. Looks like clowns and hostages on two floors. There's a SWAT team on the stairwell. Another SWAT team on the roof.

name: SWAT
line: Line's clear.

name: Gordon
line: Barbara, calm down.

name: Barbara
line: (terrified) He has the kids!

name: Gordon
line: Harvey? Where's my family?

name: SWAT
line: Blue team, acquire the target. Entry team, set your charge.

name: Batman
line: Fox, the SWATs are targeting the wrong people. The clowns are the hostages.

name: SWAT
line: Red team, go! Red team, go!

name: SWAT
line: Entry team, blow and go!

name: Batman
line: Don't move.

name: SWAT
line: Take the shot.

name: Fox
line: Those SWATs are coming in hot.

name: SWAT
line: Freeze! Stand down or you will be...

name: FOX
line: Look up. See those bad guys on the floor above? They're waiting to ambush the SWAT team coming up the elevator.

name: SWAT
line: Sixty seconds.

name: SWAT
line: Go, go, go! Blue team, cover!

name: FOX
line: Trouble on the floor above.

name: SWAT
line: Be advised. Clowns are hostages, doctors are targets.

name: Joker
line: Ah, you made it. I'm so thrilled.

name: Batman
line: Where's the detonator?

name: Joker
line: (to the dogs) Go get him.

name: SWAT
line: Put down your weapon! Don't move!

name: BusinessMan
line: No one wants to get their hands dirty. Fine. I'll do it. Those men on that boat? They made their choices. They chose to murder and steal. It doesn't make any sense for us to have to die too.

name: Joker
line: All the old familiar places...

name: Fox
line: Stand by.

name: SWAT
line: Red team, floor secure. Hostages are safe.

name: Joker
line: We really should stop this fighting, otherwise we'll miss the fireworks.

name: Batman
line: (grunting, gasping for breath) There won't be any fireworks.

name: Joker
line: (waving his hand) And here... we... go.

name: Batman
line: What were you trying to prove? That deep down... everyone's as ugly as you?

name: Batman
line: You're alone.

name: Joker
line: Ugh… You can't rely on anyone these days. You gotta do everything yourself. Don't we?!

name: Joker
line: That's okay. I came prepared. It's a funny world we live in. (pointing towards his face) Speaking of which, you know how I got these scars?

name: Batman
line: No, but I know how you got these.

name: Joker
line: Oh, oh... Oh, you... You just couldn't let me go, could you?

name: Joker
line: This is what happens when an unstoppable force... meets... an immovable object. You... truly are... incorruptible, aren't you? Huh?! You won't kill me out of some misplaced sense of self-righteousness. And I won't kill you because you're just too much fun. I think you and I... are destined to do this forever.

name: Batman
line: You'll be in a padded cell forever.

name: Joker
line: Maybe we could share one. You know, they'll be doubling up, the rate this city's inhabitants are losing their minds.

name: Batman
line: This city just showed you that it's full of people ready to believe in good.

name: Joker
line: (waving his finger) Until their spirit breaks completely. Until they get a good look at the real Harvey Dent… Huh? And all the heroic things he's done.

name: Joker
line: You didn't think I'd risk losing the battle for Gotham's soul in a fistfight with you? No... You need an ace in the hole. Mine's Harvey.

name: Batman
line: What did you do?

name: Joker
line: I took Gotham's white knight and I... brought him down to our level. It wasn't hard. See, madness, as you know, is... like gravity. All it takes is a little push.

name: Gordon
line: Dent!

name: Gordon
line: I know, I was here... trying to save her.

name: Gordon
line: I couldn't.

name: Gordon
line: I was trying to fight the Mob!

name: Gordon
line: You're not going to hurt my family.

name: Gordon
line: Put the gun down, Harvey.

name: Gordon
line: Harvey, put down the gun. Please. Please, Harvey. Please.

name: Gordon
line: Oh, goddamnit, will you stop pointing that gun at my family?!

name: Barbara
line: No!

name: Barbara
line: No, Jim, stop him!

name: Gordon
line: Harvey!

name: Barbara
line: Don't let him...

name: Gordon
line: Harvey! I'm sorry! For everything! Please don't hurt my son.

name: Gordon
line: All they know is there's a situation. They don't know who or what. They're just creating a perimeter.

name: Batman
line: You don't wanna hurt the boy, Harvey.

name: Batman
line: What happened to Rachel wasn't chance. We decided to act. We three.

name: Batman
line: (sad) It wasn't...

name: Batman
line: Because you were the best of us. He wanted to prove that even someone as good as you could fall.

name: Batman
line: You're the one pointing the gun, Harvey. So point it at the people responsible!

name: Gordon
line: Harvey, you're right. Rachel's death was my fault. Please don't punish the boy. Please, punish me.

name: Gordon
line: (whispering) It's going to be alright, son.

name: Jimmy
line: Dad? Daddy, is he okay?

name: Gordon
line: Thank you.

name: Batman
line: (looking down) You don't have to thank me.

name: Gordon
line: Yes, I do. (also looking down) The Joker won.

name: Gordon
line: Harvey's prosecution, everything he fought for... undone. Whatever chance you gave us at fixing our city dies with Harvey's reputation. We bet it all on him. The Joker took the best of us and tore him down. People will lose hope.

name: Batman
line: They won't. They must never know what he did.

name: Gordon
line: Five dead? Two of them cops? You can't sweep that...

name: Batman
line: No. But the Joker cannot win. Gotham needs its true hero.

name: Gordon
line: No.

name: Batman
line: (panting) You either die a hero... or you live long enough… to see yourself become the villain. I can do those things, because I'm not a hero, not like Dent. I killed those people. That's what I can be.

name: Gordon
line: No, no, you can't. You're not!

name: Batman
line: I'm whatever Gotham needs me to be.

name: Batman
line: Call it in.

name: Gordon
line: A hero. Not the hero we deserved, but the hero we needed. Nothing less than a knight... shining.

name: Gordon
line: They'll hunt you.

name: Batman
line: You'll hunt me. You'll condemn me. Set the dogs on me.

name: Batman
line: Because that's what needs to happen. Because sometimes... the truth isn't good enough. Sometimes people deserve more. Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded.

name: Jimmy
line: Batman? Batman! Why's he running, Dad?

name: Gordon
line: Because we have to chase him.

name: Cop
line: Okay, we're going in! Go, go! Move!

name: Jimmy
line: He didn't do anything wrong.

name: Gordon
line: Because he's the hero Gotham deserves, but not the one it needs right now. So we'll hunt him...

name: Gordon
line: Because he can take it. Because he's not a hero. He's a silent guardian, a watchful protector.

name: Gordon
line: A dark knight.
